---
id: GetWsToken
title: Get token
sidebar_label: Get token
sidebar_position: 4
---

**Type:** POST  
**Description:** `/v4/ws-token`

### Parameters

| name | type | mandatory | default | description            | ranges |
| ---- | ---- | --------- | ------- | ---------------------- | ------ |
| –    | –    | false     | N/A     | No parameters required | –      |

### Notes

- Limit flow rules: **1 request / 10s / apikey**
- The `accessToken` is valid for **2 days**.
- Calling this endpoint again will **reset the validity period**.
- `accessToken` is equivalent to **listenKey**, used for establishing WebSocket connections.

### Request Example

```json title="Request"
curl --location --request POST 'https://sapi.xt.com/v4/ws-token' \
  --header 'accept: */*' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'validate-algorithms: HmacSHA256' \
  --header 'validate-recvwindow: 60000' \
  --header 'validate-appkey: xxxxxxxxxx' \
  --header 'validate-timestamp: xxxxxxxxxx' \
  --header 'validate-signature: xxxxxxxxxx' \
```

### Response Example

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "SUCCESS",
  "ma": [],
  "result": {
    "accessToken": "eyJhbqGciOiJSUzI1NiJ9..h3zJlJBQrK2x1HvUxsKivnn6PlSrSDXXXJ7WqHAYSrN2CG5XPTKc4zKnTVoYFbg6fTS0u1fT8wH7wXqcLWXX71vm0YuP8PCvdPAkUIq4-HyzltbPr5uDYd0UByx0FPQtq1exvsQGe7evXQuDXx3SEJXxEqUbq_DNlXPTq_JyScI",
    "refreshToken": "eyJhbGciOiqJSUzI1NiJ9..Fs3YVm5YrEOzzYOSQYETSmt9iwxUHBovh2u73liv1hLUec683WGfktA_s28gMk4NCpZKFeQWFii623FvdfNoteXR0v1yZ2519uNvNndtuZICDdv3BQ4wzW1wIHZa1skxFfqvsDnGdXpjqu9UFSbtHwxprxeYfnxChNk4ssei430"
  }
}
```
